planets.name: MERCURY
planets.description: The closest planet to the Sun, known for its rocky surface and extreme temperatures.

planets.name: VENUS
planets.description: The second planet from the Sun, known for its thick atmosphere and high temperatures.

planets.name: EARTH
planets.description: The third planet from the Sun, known for supporting life and having vast oceans.

planets.name: MARS
planets.description: The fourth planet from the Sun, known as the Red Planet, with a thin atmosphere and dusty terrain.

planets.name: JUPITER
planets.description: The largest planet in the solar system, known for its Great Red Spot and many moons.

planets.name: SATURN
planets.description: Famous for its stunning rings, Saturn is the second-largest planet in the solar system.

planets.name: URANUS
planets.description: The seventh planet from the Sun, known for its blue color and unique tilt.

planets.name: NEPTUNE
planets.description: The farthest planet from the Sun, known for its deep blue color and strong winds.
